definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Ma Liang liked drawing very much.
The whole question of what is remembered in time is crucial to Maleonn.
sentences.chinese: 适时记住什么东西，这个问题对于马良来说至关重要。

sentences.english: Ma Liang went back to draw for the poor again.
sentences.chinese: 从此以后，马良继续用他的神笔帮穷人们画画。

sentences.english: Being the Theatre of Life is what reunites all Maleonn's photographic series.
sentences.chinese: “生活剧院”是马良所有摄影系列的重新整合。

sentences.english: Ma Liang was a good boy. He helped people.
sentences.chinese: 马良是一个善良的男孩，他帮助所有的人。

sentences.english: Ma Liang the Magic Brush is one of my favourite tales.
sentences.chinese: 《神笔马良》是我最喜欢的童话之一。

sentences.english: Ma Liang used sticks to draw because he had no paintbrushes.
sentences.chinese: 马良用小树枝画画，因为他没有画笔。

sentences.english: The bad man didn't have gold. So he painted gold with the magic paintbrush.
sentences.chinese: 有个不帮助别人的坏人，他把马良的神笔拿走了。

sentences.english: Xuande read the letter and told Ma Liang to return.
sentences.chinese: 玄德看了书，便教马良先回。

sentences.english: Precious horses are taken good care of here.
sentences.chinese: 宝马良驹在这里受到了加倍的呵护。

definition: first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
class or grade/generation/plaintiff and defendant (old)/government department (old)
a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑[Xian1 bei1] nomadic people/two-character surname Yuwen
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
